extensions: the list of extensions the bot wil use. each should be a filename from ./extensions/, minus the .py
guilds: the id(s) of the guild(s) the bot should be available in. Leave list empty for global

leader_ids: the id(s) of the role(s) representing admins
channel_ids: the id(s) of the channel(s) where messages from leaders will automatically get threads

feedback_channel_id: the id of the channel where feedback messages will be sent. probably one only seen by admins. This string will be replaced by the integer id
